Html:
Hi,

in the User Manual under Visualization Using GLEE there is a block of sample code

IVertexAndEdgeListGraph<string, Edge<string>> g = ...;
GleeGraphPopulator<string, Edge<string>> populator = GleeUtility.Create<string, Edge<string>>(g);
populator.Execute();
Graph g = populator.GleeGraph; // we have the graph :)

I cant find such constructors. I guess that you've made changes and replaced them with something else.
Can you please provide a more up to date example of using GLEE? I would appreciate that! I'm using QuickGraph and GLEE for my Thesis.

PS. May I suggest something? Update and enrich User Manual. Provide more samples.

Oops, GleeGraphUtility instead of GleeUtility.

File a work item on the manual/samples.
